description: This file implements a React context-based state management for a Todo application, providing hooks and a provider component to manage Todo items, including loading, creating, updating, and deleting todos via API calls.

methods.name: useTodoStore
methods.description: Custom React hook to access the Todo context, enforcing usage within a TodoProvider.

methods.name: TodoProvider
methods.description: React component that provides Todo state and actions to its children, handling data fetching and updates.
